name: Snowy Showdown
description:
Made for GGJ + Core Holiday Jam

Shoot the enemy team members with your snowball gun. The team who gets 10 kills first, wins the round and the most skilled player climbs to the highest podium.

Increase your running speed by shooting at the ground at your feet. By riding on the clouds you can find great shooting spots. If you need healing, head to the tower elevators.

Adjustable camera distance.

MB1 - shoot
R - reload
Shift - sprint
C - crouch
